title: Noodle Factory
text: is an AI-powered chatbot platform that automates exam prep and tutoring to enhance productivity and improve student learning outcomes.
featureText: Noodle Factory leverages AI to revolutionize education with Walter+, an AI teaching assistant.  This platform focuses on personalized learning, automated exam prep, and instant feedback for students and educators.

features.title: AI-Driven Personalization
features.text: Walter+ tailors learning paths to each student's needs. It analyzes strengths/weaknesses to deliver custom support. This leads to deeper student engagement and better outcomes.

features.title: Content-Focused Intelligence
features.text: Noodle Factory works with your existing resources (textbooks, notes, etc.). Instead of pre-packaged content, it transforms your materials into an interactive, AI-powered learning experience. This offers teachers flexibility and control

features.title: Productivity & Instant Feedback
features.text: Walter+ automates time-consuming tasks like grading and routine tutoring, including providing feedback on essay questions. The AI offers immediate responses to both quizzes and written assignments, freeing teachers to focus on high-level instruction and saving students valuable time.
